description:
The show revisits their timeless contributions, blending history, performance,
and storytelling into one wholesome experience. Curated and written by Avanti
Patel, and directed by Mallika Singh and Meghana AT, the show is a heartfelt
ode to legendary performers such as Gauhar Jaan, Begum Akhtar, Iqbal Bano,
Shobha Gurtu and several women artists after them.
name: Windmills Music Night - O Gaanewali

performer.description: O Gaanewali is a unique musical celebration of the women who defined, popularised, and immortalised genres like Thumri, Dadra, Ghazal, Chaiti, Hori, and more. These women, known as gaanewalis, carried an unparalleled legacy of artistry and emotion, shaping Hindustani semi classical music history.
performer.name: O Gaanewali

description:
Performing with her quartet, Naima has appeared at Biko, JazzMI (opening for
Seun Kuti), Big Bang Festival, Lecco Jazz Festival, and Germany’s Leibnitz
Jazz Festival. A former member of Black Beat Movement, she continues to shape
Europe’s evolving jazz-soul landscape.
name: Windmills Music Night - Naima Farao 4et

performer.description: Milan-based singer and composer Naima Faraò is a standout voice in contemporary jazz and alternative soul. Blending her roots in music and visual arts, she crafts an intimate sound shaped by soulful melodies, jazz harmonies, and subtle electronic textures. Her debut album Dots (2024) earned international acclaim from BBC Radio 2, MusicaJazz, Rai Radio 3, and Radio Monte Carlo, and features collaborations with Ilhan Ersahin, Napoleon Maddox, and Samir Langus. In 2025, the project culminated in a sold-out show at Blue Note Milan.
performer.name: Naima Farao 4et
